channel.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
channel.description:
[center][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/63884946/scr/logo.png[/img]
Challenging Experience Rates Challenging Drop Rates Dungeoneering Summoning Working Pets Best PVP and PVM Safe PVP Box All Minigames All Skills Lots of Bosses Unique Home PVP Armor Money Pouch Dicing Player Owned Shops Perfect Slayer God Wars 614 Items 317 Characters Flawless Combat Much more!
[size=18pt][u][b]Website[/b][/u][/size] http://www.rune-eden.net or http://www.rune-eden.org
[size=18pt][u][b]Screenshots Removed - New Screenshots Coming Soon[/b][/u][/size] This server has been updated much since it has been posted, I will be taking screenshots of all new content soon. Until then please bare with me.

item.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

eclipse rsps:

The custom’s make me want to throw up :|. Other than that it looks decent.

What’s wrong with the customs? Is it that you just don’t like customs?

Soulcist:

So I haven’t seen these forums, where are those?

I’ve decided to remove them for now as we haven’t been able to afford professional forums yet and the ones we had were terrible. I plan on building new forums that will match the website when I get a new host and such.

Edit: Also the forums weren’t very active, most of the players weren’t interested in posting anything.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers

item.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“KingLuke, post:26, topic:454103”]Hey, I am currently joining the server. Although I have seen something which has already nearly made me quit already. Well, multiple things.

  1. Partyhats are like $4
  2. You can donate for 99’s…[/quote]

The 99’s you can donate for are only the combat skills and it’s not even all of them. The combat is fairly easy to get 99 anyhow. Partyhats vary in price depending on how rare they are in-game, and it’s not like you can’t obtain one if you don’t donate for it. There are other ways to get these things, but anyhow there has to be some things on the site store to help support the server and pay for the VPS. It’s not like a server is going to run forever on it’s own without any type of financial support unless it is home hosted which isn’t very reliable at all.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers

item.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

xzorniax:

Insidiax. But You did plenty of good changes.

Yes, I like to think of it as a base source and not just a ‘leech’. I’ve done lots of work to this such as over 400 bug fixes, 13 dupe fixes, 4 dungeoneering smuggles, and many more. I’ve fixed memory leaks, problems with PVP causing the server itself to crash. I also added plenty of new features which I haven’t been able to get around taking screenshots of them but I will as soon as possible.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers

item.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“RuneEden, post:10, topic:454103”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=556977.msg4076247#msg4076247 date=1344872193]

Mind explaining the experience rates? Because 70 attack, 37 strength, and 28 hitpoints doesn’t make sense in any way.

The screenshots show that I used the EXP lamp for 70 attack, and the others were just random hits?
[/quote]So an XP lamp gives that much experience?

Yes the server has challenging experience rates compared to most servers, I’m giving starters 1 experience lamp (un-tradeable) to help them get started off. It’s not a permanent thing.[/quote]still seems like a lot of xp

Read full topic

item.title: RuneEden - The Eden of RuneScape Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:9, topic:454103”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=556977.msg4076245#msg4076245 date=1344872106]

Mind explaining the experience rates? Because 70 attack, 37 strength, and 28 hitpoints doesn’t make sense in any way.

The screenshots show that I used the EXP lamp for 70 attack, and the others were just random hits?
[/quote]So an XP lamp gives that much experience?[/quote]

Yes the server has challenging experience rates compared to most servers, I’m giving starters 1 experience lamp (un-tradeable) to help them get started off. It’s not a permanent thing.

Read full topic
